column4: You might like lucid when it is out of beta. So far It is far more stable than I expected and it is an alpha.
That was the exact same thing I heard when 9.10 was out. I love ubuntu any day over windows and I'm not complaining. But oflate, I've faced too many problems.

I had all kinds of issue with 9.10 when it came out. Bashed my head in for a bit and just followed the bug reports till they were fixed. But so far plymouth is the only thing that is bitting me with lucid.
Idk. Im still basing my head. Lets hope 10.04 fixes it all. :)
